name: Soy-Balsamic Vinaigrette
description: Note: This recipe can easily be scaled up or down, and lasts forever in the fridge. If you have plastic squeeze bottles, there's no need to first whisk in a bowl—construct the dressing in the bottles using the same ratio...
recipeIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, grated on a microplane grater
1 small shallot, grated on a microplane grater
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and whisk. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to sealed container. Shake vigorously to emulsify before each use.
